mapper.sql: review_no AS reviewNo, customer_id AS customerId, teacher_id AS teacherId, customer_name AS customerName, teacher_name AS teacherName, customer_picture AS customerPicture, teacher_picture AS teacherPicture, study_progressname AS studyProgressname, study_programlanguage AS studyProgramlanguage, review_content AS reviewContent, review_rating AS reviewRating, review_regdate AS reviewRegdate
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM review where study_progressname = #{studyProgressname} ORDER BY review_regdate DESC,review_no DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( customer_id, teacher_id, customer_name, teacher_name, customer_picture, teacher_picture, study_progressname, study_programlanguage, review_content, review_rating ) VALUES ( #{customerId}, #{teacherId}, #{customerName}, #{teacherName}, #{customerPicture}, #{teacherPicture}, #{studyProgressname}, #{studyProgramlanguage}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewRating} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} and study_progressname = #{studyProgressname}
